description: Updates the properties of the specified limit.

parameters.name: farmId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the farm that contains the limit.

parameters.name: limitId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the limit to update.

parameters.name: displayName
parameters.description: The new display name of the limit.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The new description of the limit.

parameters.name: maxCount
parameters.description: The maximum number of resources constrained by this limit. When all of the resources are in use, steps that require the limit won't be scheduled until the resource is available. If more than the new maximum number is currently in use, running jobs finish but no new jobs are started until the number of resources in use is below the new maximum number. The maxCount must not be 0. If the value is -1, there is no restriction on the number of resources that can be acquired for this limit.
